## parseBoolean() function

Parse a string value as a boolean.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function parseBoolean(input: string): boolean;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

input


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

The value to parse.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

boolean

## Remarks

If `true` cannot be derived, result will always be `false`<!-- -->.

## Example


```ts
const result = parseBoolean('true');
```
